committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness

official_title: To amend section 466(b) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend the deadline for the distribution of late collections for the Federal Perkins Loan program.

summary.text: Perkins Loan Extension Act of 2010 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to delay from October 1, 2012, to October 1, 2013, the date after which institutions of higher education must begin distributing late Perkins Loan collections to the Secretary of Education.

titles.title: To amend section 466(b) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend the deadline for the distribution of late collections for the Federal Perkins Loan program.
